tweet.text: A large number of secret negotiation sessions between Kissinger and Le Duc Tho were held over weekends so Kissinger's absence in Washington would be less conspicuous. Check out the docs. https://t.co/2p5GVhWO6R #NoDaysOff #FRUS #VietnamWar
